resources.string: We will only use the Record Audio Permission in order to use the Speech to Text Feature
Sorry! Your device no support speech input

Smart Hafaz is an android application developed for visually impaired students. Utilising voice detection,it assists students in memorising the Quran via the \'listen and repeat\' technique. The application contains chapters starting from al-Dhuha to al-Nas, and includes al-Fatihah as well. Smart Hafaz was according primary school syllabus.It has two different level of recognition which is normal and faster.
